articles.description: As confirmed by UFC president Dana White, Israel Adesanya will fight Jan Blachowicz for the light heavyweight title next.
articles.content: As confirmed by UFC president Dana White, Israel Adesanya will fight Jan Blachowicz for the light heavyweight title next.

articles.author: By Daniel Davis For Mailonline
articles.title: Barcelona star Lionel Messi should have been sent off against Alaves, insists former LaLiga official - Daily Mail
articles.description: The disgruntled 33-year-old once again cut an irked figure during the limp draw with Alaves and was caught up in an unsavoury flashpoint involving the referee. The ball narrowly avoided the official.
articles.content:
Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi should have been shown a red card after he kicked the ball towards the referee in frustration at the weekend, according to a former LaLiga official. 
The disgruntled… [+2168 chars]

articles.author: Simon Bird
articles.title: Steve Bruce hits back at boring Newcastle United tag and makes takeover claim - Mirror Online
articles.description: The United boss insists it's not in the Toon's DNA to be a dull team to watch - but that's what Kieron Dyer and many fans are complaining about.
articles.content:
Steve Bruce has hit back at Kieron Dyer and insisted: Newcastle will never be a boring club. 
The United boss is battling to turn the Geordies into a side which can up the entertainment levels while… [+3070 chars]

articles.author: By Jackson Barron For Daily Mail Australia Aap
articles.title: Fans go wild over African singer's 'best ever' rendition of Advance Australia Fair at Bledisloe Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: David Nduwimana sang Advance Australia Fair before the third match of the rugby series between the Australian Wallabies and New Zealand All Blacks at ANZ Stadium on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Rugby fans hailed an African singer's version of the Australian national anthem at the Bledisloe Cup the 'best ever'.
